vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Mareshah = "crest of a hill"
one of the cities in the lowlands of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   ciudad; territorio de Judá; (b)   hijo mayor de Caleb, hijo de Jerahmeel; tribu de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪利沙 这个專有名詞 地名在原文的意思是 "山頂"
在猶大低地的城巿之一
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
玛利沙 这个专有名词 地名在原文的意思是 "山顶"
在犹大低地的城巿之一

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.21;
son of: Laadah (H3935)
§ Mareshah = "crest of a hill"
one of the cities in the lowlands of Judah
